desmoj.extensions.chaining.abstractions

Interface HasSuccessor<E extends Entity>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - The Entitiy which can be handled by the station
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Merger, ServiceStation, Source, SplitterOutput, Transformer

    public interface HasSuccessor<E extends Entity>
    Interface which indicates that a station has a successor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      This method is used to set the successor event
